Topic.Title: Oracle Beats IBM DB2 on Performance and Price/Performance - ORCL heading to $200+

Message.Msg: Yes, all IBM customers will jump ship every time a competitor temporarily outperforms them on one product out of 10,000. The Oracle test was probably done on a Sun box which is meaningless because Sun is on it's way to the big computer museum in the sky.

Message.Title: New share buyback program
Message.Msg: IBM will probably announce new share buyback program in 3-4 weeks, as they hinted 5 months ago. $10-15 billions can be expected.
I agree --heading bk to 95 or lower --all companies will be blaming E.U

Message.Title: Hedgies...
Message.Msg: Hedge funds saw that 205 was good resistance so they are trying to push it to 210 then unload Great time to place a put when it reaches 210

"Hedge funds saw that 205 was good resistance so they are trying to push it to 210 then unload Great time to place a put when it reaches 210" Why do the hedge funds tell you their plans. Wouldn't they be worried that you might tell one what the others are doing?
You can add ACN to that list! If the currency was going to be an issue that would have been a greater effect last quarter.

Message.Title: IBM Up on Accenture Earnings
Message.Msg: International Business Machines Corp. (NYSE:IBM): Accenture (NYSE:ACN) reported stronger results and guidance than predicted, causing RBC Capital to believe that IBM (NYSE:IBM) will report upbeat signings results. The firm thinks that IBMâ€™s signings will see a rise during 2H12, but it keeps its Sector Perform rating on the stock.

Delivering cloud services on demand tp small clients could be significant. IBM can host on efficient mainframes and compete on price/quality with Amazon & Salesforce. That and an announcement of some significant big data software may have added to the bid for IBM.
Unless ACN Took sales away from IBM.
I like the idea but at this moment i am an exhausted bull

IBM stated on their April conference call that more signing will be announced in the second half, and PureSysytems will be a driving force. IBM will not warn this quarter. This will be another beat and raise quarter. Maybe from $15.10 to $15.25? IBM will soon be trading on 2013 numbers which will be north of $17
The CEO of Salesforce was ripping IBM. That tells me they are concerned.

"The CEO of Salesforce was ripping IBM. That tells me they are concerned." They should be concerned. IBM can deliver cloud services from mainframes that are very efficient, secure and have up-time approaching 100%. IBM should be able to compete on price. IT changes have created the opportunity for IBM to re-visit the old service bureau concept of "renting" use of software on a time share basis. It was long ago in 1970's Chicago when I ran an IBM business simulation game as a university student/employee. It was thru "SBC" which was IBM's Service Bureau Corporation. The name's corny now but it's back to the future.
